headline: App to help people quit or cut back on alcohol use
description: Reframe is the leading app to help people cut back on drinking. Reframe uses neuroscience & psychology to help people shift the way they think about drinking & help build great habits. We don't believe in stigma or restrictions. In the past 12 months, Reframe has had over 2M+ users and has helped more people cut back on alcohol use than any other org worldwide.

# Drink Less, Live More
#### Reframe the way you think and drink through neuroscience
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d10433104bca13abce2c13/648c8004705dbf74221644af_image%208.png)](https://www.joinreframeapp.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/reframe-drink-less-thrive/id1485756576>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d10433104bca13abce2c13/648b92549eb5eaf9cd95a8c8_5a902dbf7f96951c82922875%201.png)](https://www.joinreframeapp.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.glucobit.reframe>)
## We do science, not stigma.
#### Developed with hundreds of medical and mental health experts, Reframe is a revolutionary alcohol-related habit change app.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d10433104bca13abce2c13/62f5618a76402761780a7486_all%20in%20one.png)
### All-In-One
The only platform that utilizes neuroscience, bringing together an evidence-based behavior change program, tools, and a supportive community.
### Evidence-Based Alcohol Reduction Program
Our world-renowned program is developed by leading experts in the fields of psychology and neuroscience.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d10433104bca13abce2c13/648c80597062283d7ce72dfa_Mask%20group.png)
### Reframe Works. Period.
The proof is in the data! Even when compared to other apps, Reframe users reported a significantly lower amount of alcohol consumption.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d10433104bca13abce2c13/62f694350a75172a8b2b79bb_chart.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d10433104bca13abce2c13/62f6a8d0c49a95e1b4a64ef6_brain-reframesite.png)
With Reframe’s neuroscience-based program, habit changes stick.‍So far, Reframe has already helped millions around the world make lasting changes to their drinking habits.
## **91% of Reframe users noted a substantial decrease in alcohol use within 3 months.**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60d10433104bca13abce2c13/62f6b726af7b5b49383d089f_featureon.png)
### Neuroscience-Based Alcohol Reduction Program 
The heart of Reframe is our exclusive program, developed by leading experts in the fields of mental health and medicine. Visit your Daily Tasks to learn something new every day.
### Personalized Drink Tracker
Stay accountable day-by-day and keep track of your progress over time.
### In-Depth Courses Covering Every Area
Learn something new with Reframe Courses — recorded and live videos about everything you need to build a meaningful life while drinking less.
### 24/7 Private, Anonymous Community
Level up your alcohol-free or mindful drinking life with friends! Celebrate milestones or give and receive support. The journey is always better together!
### Comprehensive Toolkit for All Your Needs
Everything you need to beat cravings is at the touch of a button! Tune into a meditation, keep your hands busy with a game, or watch an inspiring video.
### Ready To Meet the Best Version of Yourself?

Founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, Reframe has rapidly established itself as a global leader in this space, boasting over 2 million users in the last year alone.

Headquartered in Atlanta, GA, Reframe's team of 35 is dedicated to creating a stigma-free environment for individuals seeking to change their relationship with alcohol. Their approach is not about enforcing restrictions but rather fostering new habits through evidence-based methods. They have developed an all-in-one platform that integrates a behavior change program, practical tools, and a supportive community atmosphere.

With a user-centric design, Reframe offers features like a personalized drink tracker, in-depth courses on mindful drinking, and a 24/7 anonymous community to connect users who are on similar journeys. Impressively, within just three months, 91% of users have reported a significant decrease in their alcohol consumption.

The app has garnered 3.25 million downloads and more than 31,000 five-star reviews, illustrating its effectiveness and popularity among those looking to lead healthier lives. Reframe isn't just an app; it's a movement toward better mental health and consumer well-being in an increasingly alcohol-centric culture.

To learn more and get started, check out their website [here](https://www.joinreframeapp.com/).
